detail_desc: 3/4-length leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Legs with sewn-in creases down the front and a raw-edge flounce at the hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux shearling lining and faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap. Chest pockets with a concealed zip and patch front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Soft faux shearling lining. The polyester content of the parka is partly recycled.

Short shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Small bag in faux shearling that can be worn either around the waist or over the shoulder. Zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Recycled polyester lining.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood, front pockets and a contrasting colour zip down the front with a chin guard.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with a drawstring and small appliqué at the top, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.

Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a chest pocket. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, visible button fly, front and back pockets and skinny legs.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, small, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip at the top with a round pull. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in lace with a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the bodice. Detachable adjustable shoulder straps and short lace sleeves. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a seam at the waist. Satin lining.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and two open front pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted, short-sleeved body in stretch jersey with a turtle neck, string back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sun hats in cotton twill. Lined.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Coat in a jacquard-weave cotton blend containing some linen with an embroidered pattern front and back and long fringing at the hem. Side pockets, ties at the front and extra-long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Elastic hairband with decorative fabric flowers.
Gilet in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and a ribbed hem.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with pleats and pin-tucks at the front and a button at the neckline. Short puff sleeves and a narrow tie belt at the waist.

Ankle-length suit trousers in washed linen with pleats at the front and an extended waistband with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
High-waisted shorts in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell with a rope-look tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a stand-up collar with long, decorative ties and concealed buttons at the front. Pleats at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, V-neck and slits in the sides.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Wide, straight-cut blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide balloon sleeves with a frill at the top and elasticated cuffs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and pleats at the front of the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a frill trim at the top and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Seam with covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Base layer set with a vest top and pair of leggings in warming, functional fabric that helps you retain your natural body temperature. Vest top with a lace trim around the neckline. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Imitation suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Wide shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, V-neck and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Long raglan sleeves with mesh details. Seamless.
Boxy jumper in rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a wide polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a shimmering metallic finish. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a low-cut back and high-cut legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and short raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with inset lace trims at the top, a small frill trim around the neckline and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a hole pattern, small stand-up collar and long sleeves.

Jacket in cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder tabs, a thin hood that can be concealed in the stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, two flap patch pockets with a press-stud and two inner pockets. Drawstring at the waist and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in an airy rib knit with a V-neck and button placket.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking around the neckline and hem and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft pointelle made from organic cotton jersey. Wrapover front with a decorative scalloped trim, and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Calf-length, gathered dress in woven fabric with decorative frill trims. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gathered, frill-trimmed seam around the skirt for added volume at the hem. Unlined.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping viscose jersey. Wide top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Wide, straight-cut bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and lace at the hems.
Soft bandeau bras in jersey with decorative gathers at the front and a silicone trim at the top. Lined at the front.
A pair of twisted-hoop earrings in recycled zinc.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a narrow heel strap. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with a lace trim at the top and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
